summary: The Doctor's worst enemies, The Daleks, The Cybermen, The Angels and The Silence, return, as the doctor's eleventh life comes to a close, and his twelfth life begins.
cast: Matt Smith|Jenna Coleman|Orla Brady|James Buller|Elizabeth Rider|Sheila Reid|Mark Anthony Brighton|Rob Jarvis|Tessa Peake-Jones|Jack Hollington|Sonita Henry|Kayvan Novak|Tom Gibbons|Ken Bones|Aidan Cook|Nicholas Briggs|Barnaby Edwards|Nicholas Pegg|Ross Mullan|Dan Starkey|Sarah Louise Madison|Karen Gillan|Peter Capaldi|Alexandra Arrol|Caitlin Blackwood|Louise Bowen|Simon Carew|Martin Challinor|Jon Davey|Michael Dickins|Marcus Elliot|Barbara Fadden|Jamie Hill|Tim Howard|Claudio Laurini
keywords: death of hero|eleventh doctor|twelfth doctor|doctor who|trenzalore
title: The Time of the Doctor
